{{cpp/utility/basic_stacktrace/title|rbegin|crbegin}}
{{cpp/utility/basic_stacktrace/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | num=1 | since=c++23 |
const_reverse_iterator rbegin()  const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl | num=2 | since=c++23 |
const_reverse_iterator crbegin() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns a reverse iterator to the first entry of the reversed {{tt|basic_stacktrace}}. It corresponds to the last entry of the original {{tt|basic_stacktrace}}. If the {{tt|basic_stacktrace}} is empty, the returned iterator is equal to {{lc|rend()}}.

{{image|range-rbegin-rend.svg}}

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
Reverse iterator to the first entry.

===Complexity===
Constant.
